organisation_name: European Federation of Precision, Mechanical and Optical Industries (EUROM)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Medical Devices Experts Group#E01574#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1574#Member#C#Classification and Borderline Expert Group#E01306#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1306#Member#C
goals__remit:
The object of EUROM is to represent the joint interests of the precision mechanical and optical industries and to promote cooperation amongst the members. 
 
Members of EUROM are the professional organizations which represent the precision mechanical and optical industries in their respective countries (member states of the EU).
legal_status: nicht-rechtsfähiger Verein im Sinne des § 54 BGB
